content: the slimes are a creature from the video game genshin impact spherical little troublemakers cause problems all over teyvat for the traveler and locals alike this pattern is available at the moment as a photo-slide on tiktok and will be updated to a word document soon the base pattern involves the spherical body horns wings and eyes this is suitable for making a basic electro slime anemo slime hydro or pyro slime pattern is written for heavy worsted weight yarn i used a size 4 0 mm g hook but use whatever hook gives you gauge please note that this is a pattern and does not include a full tutorial at this time
